theSorceress:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theSorceress:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theSorceress:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theSorceress:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theSorceress:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theSorceress:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theSorceress:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theSorceress:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theSorceress:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theSorceress:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theSorceress:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theSorceress:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theSorceress:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
